Hi! My name is Aimee Schwab-McCoy and I'm an Assistant Professor of Statistics at Creighton University. At Creighton, I serve as the Program Director of our major and minor in Data Science, and I teach introductory and upper level courses in statistics, biostatistics, data science, and machine learning.

I am also a certified RStudio Instructor, and an active researcher in statistics and data science education and curriculum development. 

This website is a work in progress. While I'm working, feel free to check out my CV [here](files/AimeeSchwab-McCoy_CV.pdf).
